component.marketing.sales.pitch.gochat.F:
GoCHAT is an integrated Facebook chat where you communicate with your customers reaching to your fanpage on Facebook or via messenger icon in your Website or Mobile App.
Most importantly a CRM which saves customer data in real time and links Facebook profiles with your customer's ID.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.gochat.Z:
GoCHAT is an integrated Zalo chat where you communicate with your customers reaching to your Official Account on Zalo or via zalo messenger icon in your Website or Mobile App.
Most importantly a CRM which saves customer data in real time and links Zalo profiles with your customer's ID.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.CREATE_S: Create a service listing for your online shop with fully customisable service description, Service details and most importantly option to add up to 10 locations and almost unlimited amount of time slots so your customers can choose what time fits  them the most without having to call you or message you.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.PRODUCT_: Group products that share the same characteristics manually or automaticaly if they meet the collection condition. You can also save time by creating discount codes and wholesale pricing for a collection level so all the products in that collection will have the discount codes or wholesale price changes applied to.

Why do I need reviews?  Majority of customers rely on other peoples review, therefore giving an option to review the product after the purchase is a crucial element in your online shop. The more positive review the product has the more people tend to buy it.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.RESERVAT: Turn reservation management of the online shop into a pleasant experience for your customers when greeted by their name when entering your Shops premises. Gosells reservation management comes with all important information [ booking ID, Arrival date	ime ,Customer info etc...] displayed all in one interface.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.SERVICE_: Group services that share the same characteristics manually or automaticaly if they meet the collection condition. You can also save time by creating discount codes and wholesale pricing for a collection level so all the services in that collection will have the discount codes or wholesale price changes applied to.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.CREATE_S: Segmentation is a tool that lets you choose set of rules or conditions [ e.g order from specific area, Order via a specific platform [e.g APP], minimum purchase volumes or have a Customer tag] and apply it to customer. If customer meets these conditions the access to specific shops perks and benefits such as wholesale pricing, loyalty programme  will be available
component.marketing.sales.pitch.ANALYTIC: See how your online business is performing and what actions you need to take to make improvements. Preview the order stats, total sales, sales of the shop every day, every week, every month and compare it to your total order amount.

See how your online business is performing and what actions you need to take to make improvements. Preview the reservations stats, total sales, sales of the shop every day, every week, every month and compare it to your total reservation amount.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.NOTIFICA: Push Notification is an ultimate marketing tool that allows you to send PUSH notifications with content you design direclty to buyers app .One of the biggest benefits of the PUSH notification feature is that to send notification and reach thousands of customers using your app instantly doesn't cost anything and has a huge impact on your sales.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.EMAIL.de: Email marketing is a great tool to Reach to thousands of Customer' s Inboxes With Your Latest News, Deals and Increase Traffic to Your Shop For Free. With Gosell You can easily customize email templates to fit to your audience needs and reach even better results
Creating loyalty program and rewarding customers when buying more often or at bigger quantities can be extremely beneficial for the shop as the relationship between you and your customers will improve and retention of them coming back to your shop will increase.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.CREATE_D: Create discount codes to attract new customers to your shop or retain the old ones by rewarding them for completing the objective such as downloading your app or creating an account in return for higher discounts.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.LANDING_: Create unlimited amount of landing pages with gosell subdomain. Upgrade your plan to GoLEAD to get access to SEO tools and tracking functions such as (google analytics, facebook pixel ) and even a custom domain for your landingpages.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.PROMOTIO: Create special pricing policies to attract new customers to your shop or retain the old ones by rewarding them for completing the objective such as downloading app, creating an account in return for higher discounts or lower prices when buying bulk quantities as a wholesaler.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.CREATE_P: Are you in B2B sales ? Do you want to offer different wholesale pricing levels depending on the purchase volume to different customers without displaying the price publicaly ? Create wholesale prices in gosell and set rules what customers see what prices.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.CREATE_O: Get the most out of the most advance in-store management software with the O2O connected technology .Manage all business activities and create instore orders with mutltiple payment options, CRM and inventory management .Accelerate your business growth now and connect your website , mobile app and offline shop and build a powerfull offline to online connected business.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.CUSTOMER: How do you increase sales , retention and improve the customer experience in the same time? You do it by knowing who your customers are. Customer data are the most valuable asset you have. Collect as much information about your users as possible and offer products and services that fit their interest the most.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.SUBDOMAI: Do you want to increase your brand awareness of your website?Activate a GoWEB plan to use a custom domain on your website.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.PREFEREN: Quickly generate product feed of your online shop’s existing product list and import them to google merchant center in seconds!
component.marketing.sales.pitch.CHAT_CON: Want to have customers communicating with you directly from your Website or Mobile App interface in just one click ? Enable Zalo or Facebook messenger in configuration tab and Messenger icons will display in interface of both platforms.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.FACEBOOK: Are you running marketing campaigns to increase traffic or sales in your online shop ? Insert  Facebook Pixel ID to your online shop (Web / App) in just few clicks and create an ultimate e-commerce online shop tracking effectiveness of campaigns, customer behaviour or retarget customers with items they are most interested in.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.GOOGLE_A: Are you running marketing campaigns to increase traffic or sales in your online shop ? Insert  Google Analytics ID to your online shop (Web / App) in just few clicks and create an ultimate e-commerce online shop tracking effectiveness of campaigns, customer behaviour and insights  about what your customers are most interested in.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.MENU.des: Create menus for your Website or App for multiple locations. Add up to 2 subcategory levels for your menu. If you want to change the menu for a seasonal sale , simply create a new menu and when the sale is over you can switch back to your original menu which is saved in your menu list.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.PAGES.de: Introduce your store return policies or say something about your shop or create a blog post so customer can get to know you better. Providing more information about your store will help your customers get their information faster and will improve their experience.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.BUY_LINK: Generate sales from external websites with buy links.Buy links generate checkout links with pre- selected products and discount code based on your configuration that allows your potential customers to checkout directly from any external website(articles, blog landing pages) where you have embedded the buy link.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.GOOGLE_V: Quickly generate product feed of your online shop’s existing product list and import them to google merchant center in seconds!
component.marketing.sales.pitch.BLOG.des: Generate sales from external websites with buy links.Buy links generate checkout links with pre- selected products and discount code based on your configuration that allows your potential customers to checkout directly from any external website(articles, blog landing pages) where you have embedded the buy link.
component.marketing.sales.pitch.FLASH_SA: Create a powerful time limited sales campaigns with a halo effect, stimulating customers to purchase items quickly before the campaigns time expires or the allocated stock for campaign is sold out.

Manage all your themes in one place!

Choose which theme is published, which ones are saved in your theme library waiting to be customized and published at the right time for any seasonal promotion. Visit Theme Store and explore numbers of themes available for all your platforms.
Looking for new themes to use for your online shop platform?
Visit our Theme Store and browse among numerous fully Responsive themes that fit any business, any platform whether you sell product or services on Mobile App or Website.
No more fixed theme layouts and limited pages

New theme editor comes with new and more system pages with unique customizable layouts. From now on GoSELL allows you to customize almost everything in your theme. Switch now and explore all the options yourself.
Hundred of components and styles are now available in your theme editor

Whether you want to change text, color or add image for promotional banners or other elements, the customization options are almost limitless. Choose from numerous elements and styles and customize your pages to your customer taste.
